description: Cross-reference: 536 extracted JS modules → 75 MCP TS engines + 12 registries

wiring_status.note: 73 MCP engines exist as independent TS implementations. 463 extracted JS modules contain additional functionality not yet integrated.

engines/physics.description: Cutting forces, thermal modeling, tool life, Johnson-Cook, chatter prediction
engines/physics.wiring_approach: Absorb calculation methods into existing TS engines. Validate physics correctness with Opus.

engines/vibration.description: Vibration analysis, chatter detection, stability lobes
engines/vibration.wiring_approach: Wire into SpindleProtectionEngine for real-time monitoring, AdaptiveControlEngine for feedback.

engines/post_processor.description: G-code post processors for Fanuc, Siemens, Haas, Mazak, Okuma
engines/post_processor.wiring_approach: Create PostProcessorEngine.ts if not exists. Wire dialect-specific post processors.

engines/optimization.wiring_approach: Consolidate 25 files into OptimizationSuiteEngine. 6 solver types.

engines/quality.wiring_approach: Wire quality algorithms. Add prism_quality dispatcher if needed.

engines/business.wiring_approach: Wire business logic. Create JobCostingEngine, QuotingEngine, InventoryEngine if needed.

engines/tools.description: Tool geometry, tool life, tool selection
engines/tools.wiring_approach: Wire tool calculation methods into ToolRegistry or new ToolEngine.

engines/cad_cam.description: CAD/CAM operations, toolpath generation, geometry processing
engines/cad_cam.wiring_approach: Large category. Classify into geometry, toolpath, feature recognition. Absorb selectively.

engines/core.wiring_approach: Review for unique functionality not in TS core.

engines/ai_ml.description: ML models, neural networks, clustering, NLP, transformers
engines/ai_ml.wiring_approach: Largest category. Deduplicate (~30 unique, ~44 dupes per roadmap). Wire unique ones.

engines/ai_complete.description: Complete AI implementations (active learning, attention, clustering, GNN, etc.)
engines/ai_complete.wiring_approach: Merge with ai_ml. Many likely duplicates of ai_ml with extended implementations.

algorithms.description: Graph algorithms, LP solvers, FFT, search, interpolation, manufacturing algorithms
algorithms.wiring_approach: Create AlgorithmRegistry. Wire through AlgorithmGatewayEngine. Classify by type.

formulas.description: Manufacturing formulas: speed/feed, tool life, surface finish, thread, power
formulas.wiring_approach: Already partially wired via FormulaRegistry. Expand with new formula modules.

materials.description: Material data by ISO group (P/M/K/N/S/H/X), core + enhanced + learned + user
materials.wiring_approach: Load into MaterialRegistry. materials/ is the current active version.

materials_complete.description: Superseded material data (M_STAINLESS, P_STEELS complete versions)
materials_complete.wiring_approach: ARCHIVE or merge with materials/. Likely superseded by materials_v9_complete.

materials_v9_complete.wiring_approach: This is the canonical latest version. Wire into MaterialRegistry.

machines.wiring_approach: Load into MachineRegistry. ENHANCED is most complete. Deduplicate across levels.

knowledge_bases.description: Manufacturing knowledge: troubleshooting, best practices, process knowledge

business.description: Business logic: costing, quoting, scheduling, inventory
business.wiring_approach: Wire into existing business engines. Create new engines per roadmap.

learning.description: Learning systems: adaptive, reinforcement, transfer learning

integration.description: External system integrations: ERP, DNC, MTConnect, OPC-UA

core.description: Core utilities and infrastructure from monolith
core.wiring_approach: Most likely already reimplemented in TS. Review for gaps.

mit.description: MIT course implementations: numerical methods, controls, DFM
mit.wiring_approach: Academic algorithms. Wire through AlgorithmGatewayEngine if manufacturing-relevant.

workholding.description: Workholding analysis, fixture selection, clamping force

constants.wiring_approach: Merge into constants.ts or separate manufacturing constants file.

wave_1_critical.description: Physics, thermal, vibration, post-processor — lives at stake

wave_2_high.description: Optimization, simulation, quality, business logic, formulas

wave_4_low.description: AI/ML, infrastructure, integrations, academic, legacy data versions

materials_versions.action: Use materials_v9_complete as canonical. Archive older versions.

machine_levels.action: ENHANCED is most complete. Deduplicate across levels.
